name: KGN Technologies
overview:
KGN Technologies is a specialized WordPress Development Company. WordPress is no longer constrained to its original rationale of blog publishing but it is now widely used as an efficient CMS and also for Ecommerce. WordPress is complete Content Management System that caters fully-functional and feature-rich solutions. WordPress is fully customized CMS platform written in PHP and MySQL as backend database. Among the other CMS platforms, WordPress is most preferred and demanded by almost all conglomerates including small to medium and large sized business. KGN Technologies has gained good expertise in developing Wordpress based CMS websites. We have done simple theme development to some complex customization and plug-ins development and also Responsive Wordpress Websites.

KGN Technologies offers top-notch custom WordPress development solutions. Being a robust and scalable CMS platform, WordPress allows web owners to edit, update and change or modify the content of website including images, videos and graphics in most prominent, optimum and conductive manners.

Our dedicated WordPress developers have in-depth experience of developing fully customized as well as SEO friendly WordPress websites. They are tremendously efficient who can leverage the assorted industry knowledge and technology skills to provide customized WordPress out of the box solutions that help our clients achieve their business objectives and needs. We can develop fully customized WordPress ecommerce sites and also integrate WordPress with third party applications etc.

Being a professional and dedicated WordPress Development Company, we develop W3C validated, cross-browser compatible and search engine friendly WP websites and blog. We are also involved in complete quality to make sure your business website exceeds highest level of quality, programming and coding standards. Our top-class WordPress development services ensures you will get visually appealing WP website to promote your products and services in professional manner.

Our WordPress Services includes:

Custom WordPress Plug-ins and Extensions Development Designing Responsive theme and converting PSDs to WordPress Themes WordPress CMS Websites Development WordPress Ecommerce solutions Dedicated WordPress Developers service Integrating Wodpress to third party systems

Our technical skills:

Magento ecommerce development Sales froce development iPhone application development Joomla CMS development Virtue Mart Wordpress Development X-Cart osCommerce PSD to XHTML
